Helen Walker

Welcome

Aug 14, 2014

Hi there!

Welcome to my space...Â  Cosy isn't it? Please make yourself at home, pull up a chair, grab a brew... I hope you find some things here that are interesting and, dare I say it, helpful.

So first things first, this is a work in progress, so I'm really happy to have your thoughts and comments, I'll be writing about all kinds of work-related things - the catagories list there on the right will give you some clues about where my musings are taking me.

If you want to know more about me or what I'm trying to achieve there are links up at the top to the pages that will no doubt evolve as I write.

This is an opportunity to play, so I'm not aiming for perfection, there will no doubt be blunders and the occassional typo along the way.

Lets have some fun!
